job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you an engineer who thrives on crafting clean code, swift deployments, and the latest in development techniques? Do you see yourself not just as a coder, but as a creator of AI-enhanced systems that outpace traditional methods? If so, you're in the right place.

   While many software teams are stuck in the past with manual debugging and conventional deployments, Trilogy is leading the way with AI-integrated development. From feature brainstorming to bug squashing and performance tuning, AI is at the core of our process, making us efficient and precise.

   In this role, you'll transform existing B2B products into cloud-native powerhouses, optimizing them with AI at every step. You'll be at the forefront of deploying AI-driven features, employing advanced retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for defect detection, and ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions. If you're after a role where action takes precedence over endless discussions, this is it.

   Ready to redefine AI-driven software engineering and fast-track your career in high-scale cloud-native development? Apply now. But if you're content with the status quo, manual test cases, and teams hesitant about automation, this isn't your calling.

   What you will be doing

     * Utilizing advanced analysis tools and RAG vector stores to spot, diagnose, and resolve product flaws and bugs.
     * Employing AI development agents to conceptualize, create, and deploy cutting-edge features for cloud-native apps.
     * Partnering with an international team to deliver top-tier, enterprise-level solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Monotonous Repetition: We minimize routine infrastructure tasks, allowing you to focus on crafting groundbreaking solutions.
     * Prolonged Meetings: We prioritize your coding expertise over lengthy discussions. Expect more action, less chatter., * Develop AI-powered features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with advanced tools.
job_details.full_text:
Senior C# Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you an engineer who thrives on crafting clean code, swift deployments, and the latest in development techniques? Do you see yourself not just as a coder, but as a creator of AI-enhanced systems that outpace traditional methods? If so, you're in the right place.

   While many software teams are stuck in the past with manual debugging and conventional deployments, Trilogy is leading the way with AI-integrated development. From feature brainstorming to bug squashing and performance tuning, AI is at the core of our process, making us efficient and precise.

   In this role, you'll transform existing B2B products into cloud-native powerhouses, optimizing them with AI at every step. You'll be at the forefront of deploying AI-driven features, employing advanced retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for defect detection, and ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions. If you're after a role where action takes precedence over endless discussions, this is it.

   Ready to redefine AI-driven software engineering and fast-track your career in high-scale cloud-native development? Apply now. But if you're content with the status quo, manual test cases, and teams hesitant about automation, this isn't your calling.

   What you will be doing

     * Utilizing advanced analysis tools and RAG vector stores to spot, diagnose, and resolve product flaws and bugs.
     * Employing AI development agents to conceptualize, create, and deploy cutting-edge features for cloud-native apps.
     * Partnering with an international team to deliver top-tier, enterprise-level solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Monotonous Repetition: We minimize routine infrastructure tasks, allowing you to focus on crafting groundbreaking solutions.
     * Prolonged Meetings: We prioritize your coding expertise over lengthy discussions. Expect more action, less chatter., * Develop AI-powered features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with advanced tools.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on C# development and AI-assisted workflows rather than core AI/ML model development or deployment. While AI is mentioned as a tool for enhancement, the primary responsibilities and technologies point towards traditional software engineering with AI augmentation, not a dedicated AI engineering role.

phrases.phrase: transform existing B2B products into cloud-native powerhouses
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business's existing products and the strategic goal of modernizing them into cloud-native solutions.

phrases.phrase: optimize them with AI at every step
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of how AI can be applied to improve existing business processes and products.
This highlights an understanding of the quality and scope expected for business solutions in an enterprise context.

phrases.phrase: Develop AI-powered features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with advanced tools.
phrases.justification: This directly relates to understanding business needs (enhancing workflows, equipping providers) and how AI can serve those needs.

phrases.phrase: employing advanced retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for defect detection
phrases.justification: RAG is a technique used in generative AI, implying some level of model adaptation or application for a specific task (defect detection).

phrases.phrase: Utilizing advanced analysis tools and RAG vector stores to spot, diagnose, and resolve product flaws and bugs.
phrases.justification: While focused on analysis, the use of RAG and vector stores implies interaction with and application of generative AI techniques for problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: Employing AI development agents to conceptualize, create, and deploy cutting-edge features
phrases.justification: This suggests using AI agents, which are often built upon or interact with generative models, for feature development.
This is the primary title and indicates a strong focus on software development using C#.
A fundamental aspect of traditional software development.
Relates to the process of releasing software, a key part of the software development lifecycle.

phrases.phrase: transform existing B2B products into cloud-native powerhouses
phrases.justification: This involves significant software engineering effort to re-architect and modernize applications.
Integrating AI capabilities into existing software systems requires software development skills.

phrases.phrase: ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions
phrases.justification: Focuses on the robustness and reliability of software releases.

phrases.phrase: Develop AI-powered features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with advanced tools.
phrases.justification: This is a direct software development task focused on creating new functionalities powered by AI.
While also a software development aspect, 'swift deployments' can imply an understanding of CI/CD and operational efficiency in releasing software.
Contrasted with AI-integrated development, suggesting a focus on modern deployment practices.

phrases.phrase: ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions
phrases.justification: This points to operational concerns around maintaining production systems and minimizing downtime.

skills: spot, diagnose, and resolve product flaws and bugs
action takes precedence over endless discussions
creator of AI-enhanced systems that outpace traditional methods
leading the way with AI-integrated development
